principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 3+ design references.
Emotion First: Every decision maps to a feeling.
Content is king: Tell a story.
Zoom in: Bold focus on details.
Contrast: Light vs Dark, Rough vs Smooth.
anti_patterns: Purple/Teal for CTA (Use Electric Violet or Acid Green instead)
Inter everywhere (Use Manrope or Space Grotesk for Headings)

marketing.name: Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Use col-span-8 for hero, col-span-4 for supporting.

dashboard.name: Control Room Grid
dashboard.rules: Dense but breathable. Use h-full on children.

cards.classes: bg-background/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-lg rounded-xl

inputs.classes: bg-background/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 font-mono text-sm

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for high-conversion cards. Animated gradient border.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Overlay a subtle noise texture on the background to kill digital flatness.

images.description: Abstract streaks of purple and green light - Use for Landing Page Hero Background
Abstract purple lines on black - Use for 'How it Works' or Feature section
Empty dark office - Use for 'About' or 'Enterprise' section background

motion.loading: Use 'Terminal' style typing effects or 'Scanner' lines for AI processing states.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use APCA standards.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update tailwind.config.js to match the 'Electric Void' palette.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the Landing Page and 'Control Room Grid' for the Dashboard.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Do not use the default 'slate' look. Inject the 'glass_crystal' style into Cards.
5. AGENT INTERFACE: Build the input form to look like a futuristic terminal or command center. Use the 'mono' font for inputs.
6. LOADING: Create a dedicated 'Processing...' screen with a typing effect or a scanning animation.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
8. MOCK API: Simulate the n8n workflow with `setTimeout` and state updates to show 'Sending...', 'Verifying...', 'Completed'.
9. TESTING: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
